styles: body { background: #111 url(/web/20080401031929im_/http://www.adobe.com/homepage/en_us/fma_rotation/fma0/background.jpg) top left } #user-menu a, #site-menu-dropdown .dropdown-tab { color: #96a2a9 } #site-menu-dropdown .dropdown-tab:hover { color: #fff; } #globalnav .cart { background-image: url(/web/20080401031929im_/http://www.adobe.com/lib/com.adobe/template/gnav/cart_light.gif); } #home-fma { min-height: 300px; _height: 300px; height: 300px; } #home-fma img { visibility: visible; } #site-menu-dropdown .dropdown-tab:hover { _color: #000; }
